QuestData.Title: The Day that Deathwing Came: What Really Happened
QuestData.Description: These two have no idea how to tell a story. Theldurin's story was too short, and Lucien's tale was a little too tall, if you catch my drift.$b$bAlso, neither of their stories had action and fans admiring my awesomeness in them.$b$bSit back, $n. I'll tell you what really happened that day.
QuestData.LogDescription: Listen to Martek the Exiled's version of the story.
QuestData.RewardText: I can't believe those guys would interrupt me like that. My story was going so well, too...$b$bAnyhow, thanks for sticking around so long. It's nice to have someone new to share tall tales with. I'm sure Lucien and Theldurin feel the same way.$b$bYou have any you'd like to share with us?

Objectives.Objective: Ride to the end of the canyon
Beat Deathwing in a knife fight
